courseDescription:
Without the tools and skills required to manage your own successful Google Ads campaign, you are going to continue to lose customers to your competition. This diploma course shows you how to create, develop and optimize a professional Google Ads campaign that sends high-quality traffic to your website around the clock.

We explain how to set up your Google AdWords account from scratch and explore the theory behind successful online advertising. We study topics like keywords and their use and demonstrate how to set up conversion tracking and track phone calls from your website. We show you how to take advantage of competitor reports and customer data in your campaigns. We then cover how to write and ‘A/B test’ your ads, which can increase ‘quality score’ and decrease costs per click. The course establishes how to understand your customers from a psychological level to drive traffic and sales.

This course walks you step-by-step through the most important aspects of Google AdWords. We help you find the fun in using Google Ads while making use of its enormous reach and capabilities. The internet bombards people with information, so it takes ability and knowledge of the flow of data behind the scenes to cut through the clutter and reach customers - so sign up for this diploma course to acquire the skills you need.

modules.description: This module provides an introduction to google ads masterclass. It begins by providing a welcome to the course, a link to the facebook group and highlights how to best use this course. This topic covers using a Google Ads formula calculator, figuring the costs per conversion and understanding what google ads are and where they appear.
topics: What is Google Ads? Where Do They Appear? Plus a Special Offer

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Creating Our First Google Ads Account: Campaign Settings
modules.description: This module provides an introduction to setting up your first Google Ads Account and gives an overview of the campaign settings. In this module you will learn about the Account Hierarchy as well as Location targeting basics. This module will also give you insight into the different types of bidding strategies that would suit your campaign as well as the various ad extensions you can use to enhance your ads.
topics: Let's Set Up Your First Google Ads Account!
Setting Languages, Your Daily Budget, and Hourly Reports
Campaign Start and End Dates, Dynamic Search Ads
Rotation Settings, Scheduling, Device Targeting, & URL Options

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Structuring Your Ad Groups Like A Professional
modules.description: This module provides an introduction to setting up your ad groups in your Google Adwords account. This module is dedicated to understanding ad groups and the basics of ad group structure. In this topic you will learn about ad group structure ideas and create your first ad group.

modules.name: Module
modules.details: How To Write Killer Ads in Google Ads!
modules.description: This module outlines how to write killer ads in Google ads. In this topic you will learn about the anatomy of Google Text ads and what makes ads successful. This topic also discusses an Ad Copy case study, the BJ Fogg Behavioral Model and creating your first Google Ad.
topics: Ad Copy Case Study, BJ Fogg Behavioral Model, & Your First Google Ad

modules.details: Keywords in Depth - The Heartbeat of Your Account
modules.description: This module provides an introduction to understanding and working with keywords in depth. This module is dedicated to understanding keywords, keyword research, keyword planning and keyword organization. Learn about the various keyword match types as well as negative keywords, traffic sculpting, SEMrush, Pivot Tables andthe Google Keyword Planner.
